headline: AMETEK, Inc. (AME): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AMETEK, Inc. (AME) on Substack by Stock Analysis Compilation. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AME. AMETEK, Inc. (AME)’s share was trading at $182.11 as of Dec 19th. AME’s trailing and forward P/E were 31.73 and 25.64 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. AMETEK stands out as […]
